contentrichtext.text: [[File:Gainsthorpe DMV.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Welcome notice, showing Gainsthorpe from the air]] [[File:Gainsthorpe Deserted Medieval Village - geograph.org.uk - 1563865.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Overview of Gainsthorpe]] '''Gainsthorpe''' is a [[Deserted Medieval Village|deserted medieval village]] (DMV) site in a field which is part of the present Gainsthorpe Farm in [[Lincolnshire]], England.<ref>{{cite PastScape|mnumber=63472|mname=Gainsthorpe}}</ref><ref>{{cite book|first=Maurice|last=Beresford|year=1983|title=Lost villages of England|pages=945, 98, 265, 335, 363 }}</ref> The site is in Hibaldstow [[civil parish]] located on a minor road west of the [[A15 road (Great Britain)|A15 road]], south of [[Hibaldstow]] and {{convert|5|mi|km|0}} south-west of [[Brigg, North Lincolnshire|Brigg]].<ref>{{cite map |publisher=OSGB |title=Ancholme Valley: Barton-upon-Humber, Brigg, Scunthorpe & Kirton in Lindsey |url=http://leisure.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/products/paper-maps/paper-maps-ordnance-survey-great-britain/paper-maps-ordnance-survey-great-britain-os-explorer-active-map/ancholme-valley/pid-9780319464335 |edition=3 |date=3/11/2006 |year= |cartography= |scale=1:25000 |series=OS Explorer |page=|section=281 |inset= |accessdate= |isbn=978-0-319-46433-5 |id= |ref= SE956011}} Gainsthorpe DMV {{gbmappingsmall|SE956011}}</ref> It is now in the care of [[English Heritage]]. There is a small car park from where a footpath of about {{convert|220|yd|m|0}} leads to the site. The typical medieval layout of [[Sunken lane|sunken roads]] and raised rectangular tofts and crofts is clearly seen in the [[earthworks (archaeology)|humps and hollows]] of the field. ==References== {{refbegin}}{{reflist}} {{refend}} ==External links== {{Commons category|Gainsthorpe Deserted Medieval Village}} *[http://www.diplomate.freeserve.co.uk/gainsthorpe.htm Lost Village Sites of Lincolnshire : Gainsthorpe] *[http://www.english-heritage.org.uk/daysout/properties/gainsthorpe-medieval-village/ History, research and visiting information:English Heritage] {{coord|53.49792|N|0.56031|W|region:GB_source:enwiki-osgb36(SE956011)_type:city|display=title}}<!-- Note: WGS84 lat/long, converted from OSGB36 grid ref --> [[Category:Deserted medieval villages in Lincolnshire]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in Lincolnshire]] [[Category:English Heritage sites in Lincolnshire]] [[Category:Archaeological sites in Lincolnshire]]
